content: मन्युः [मन्-युच् <ls>Uṇ. 3. 20</ls>] {@--1@} Anger, wrath, resentment, indignation, rage: <ls>R. 2. 32</ls>, <ls n="R. 2.">49</ls>; <ls n="R.">11. 46.</ls> {@--2@} Grief, sorrow, affliction, distress; <ls>U. 4. 3</ls>; <ls>Ki. 1. 35</ls>; <ls>Bk. 3. 49.</ls> {@--3@} Wretched or miserable state, meanness. {@--4@} A sacrifice. {@--5@} Spirit, mettle, courage (as of horses). {@--6@} Ardour, zeal. {@--7@} Pride. {@--8@} An epithet of Śiva. {@--9@} Of Agni.
